mapper.select: select group_concat(tags) tags from blog_info where showflag='1'
select DATE_FORMAT(create_date,"%Y-%m") month ,count(*) view_nums from blog_info a where a.showflag='1' group by DATE_FORMAT(create_date,"%Y-%m")

select d.val1 blog_type_url, d.dict_key blog_type ,d.dict_name blog_type_name,count(*) view_nums from blog_info b LEFT JOIN (select * from dict_info where dict_type="blog_type") d on d.dict_key=b.blog_type where b.showflag='1' group by d.dict_key,d.dict_name,d.val1

select a.*,d.dict_name blog_type_name,d.val1 blog_type_url from ( (select '1cur' t, a.* from blog_info a where recordid=#{recordid}) union (select '2next' t, a.* from blog_info a where a.showflag='1' and recordid>#{recordid} order by recordid asc limit 1) union (select '3pre' t, a.* from blog_info a where a.showflag='1' and recordid<#{recordid} order by recordid desc limit 1) ) a left join dict_info d on (d.dict_type='blog_type' and a.blog_type=d.dict_key) order by t asc
